name: Esciit
description:
Esciit a crash into the obscure

Jimmy wakes up next to his wrecked Porsche 550. He is all alone in a haunted pine forest. He tries to find help, but stumbles deeper into an outlandish conspiracy...

Esciit is a surreal adventure platformer.

Esciit is in early access

At this moment the game is playable, but the story ends with a cliffhanger.  There is still more story to be added. The first part took 3 months to make and the second part of the story will probably take about the same time. The second part will be released as an update to this game. Follow @supernapie on twitter or instagram for the latest news and screenshots.

Manual System requirements

Your graphics card should have full support for webgl. Check your hardware here
